author: Makena Kelly
title: Donald Trump's Win Cements a New Era for Campaigning Online

title: Far-Right Donald Trump Supporters Celebrate His Victory with Violent Memes and Calls for Executions

title: Donald Trump's New 'Border Czar' Defended Child Separation at Festival Held by Gun-Worshipping Sect
description: Tom Homan, who helped usher in the family separation policy during Trump’s first term, is promising to enact the "biggest deportation operation in the history of the United States."

description: Business leaders including Howard Schultz, Elon Musk, and Reid Hoffman weigh in on Election Day for Donald Trump, Kamala Harris — or simply peace.

description: Kent's husband, Jamie Dimon, hasn't publicly endorsed either presidential candidate this election.

title: Chloë Grace Moretz addresses her sexuality for the first time as she endorses Kamala Harris

title: ‘I'm Going to Bluesky’ Is the New ‘I’m Moving to Canada’
